data.message:
(Hook)
Just when I look up an the storms clead.
Its starts rainin again I swear its like before hand.
Im just runnin in circles an circles it never ends.
Bin on this path all alone only fare weather friends.
Guess its expected wit storms loomin so here I am.
This is my lifes perfect storm I am forever damned.

(Verse 1)
Now take a sip of this problem.
Rip in to sorrow.
That hollowed out ya days for tomorrow.
Blank gaze an wollow.
Its whiskey for breakfast lunch an Dinner.
Fuck Im in a.
Daze an follow.
To chase the sorrow.
Wit yager bombs an a whiskey bottle.
Riskey motto.
But drink the pain away.
Yager days.
Wit a red bull so I stay awake.
From the pain I take.
Like aint it great.
Im Ashamed to face.
My Problems wit out a handle placed.
Right in my hand for the scandle breaks.
An thats why I plan to drink.
Till I cant stand or think.
Im more parshall to alcohol poisoning.
For I chill wit my boys again.
Royal shits.
What Im sittin on wit these foyaled plans.
My loyal stance.
Has put me in this fuckin conundrum.
Sudan instant doom.
From dumb moves.
That I come to.
Im startin to feel like a dumb dude.
Got the chamber to the dome an the guns lubed.
So no chance it'll jam Im fuckin done BOOM!
But then I come to my senses befor the gun shoots......

(Hook)
Just when I look up an the storms clead.
Its starts rainin again I swear its like before hand.
Im just runnin in circles an circles it never ends.
Bin on this path all alone only fare weather friends.
Guess its expected wit storms loomin so here I am.
This is my lifes perfect storm I am forever damned.

(Break)
I think about my life runnin an runnin no stop.
Can't take a breather damnit sun in an sun out no drop.
In the progression speedin unendin succession's why?
I guess its life so fuck it someday I know I will thrive.

(Verse 2)
I quite the pitty party.
But still in this city starving.
Im sitting pondering.
Whats my next move an my wit is conjuring.
Songs of days.
When I was filled wit sorrow.
Still tomorrow.
My plates full wit a pill to swallow.
Must fill the hollow.
Hole in my heart wit rymes of a bitter.
Lines of bigger.
Signs Im in a.
Struggle.
Muzle the pain of this curse of words.
I was birthed to serve.
What this gifts for has bin unbeknownst to me.
Cuz heaven whispers but still grips a Hercules hold of me.
An so the weeks.
Turn to months an avert to years.
An still the depression subdues an I feal the hurts still here.
I burst in tears.
Cuz Im so lost an cant convert to here.
An another year has bin wasted its the first of the year.

replies.message: Why you like this Jarrod Patrick
